name: The Ball of the Rings
description:
The Game

Centuries of games where players kick, throw, parry or catch a ball, but what if YOU WERE THE BALL?

Challenge a friend in 3-minute matches trying to hit as many rings as possible inside the arena and, to outclass them, you need to master the laws of physics and how they affect your ball!

[2 players required - Keyboard & Mouse, Controller supported] How to play
  • Wait for the activation of the rings to cross them and earn points.
  • When a ring is crossed by a ball, it deactivates.
  • Rings of the opposite colour to yours give you 2 points!
  • Crossing a ring of the same colour gives you 0 points (but you steal it from your opponent!)
  • The team with the most points when the timer runs out wins.
